text: Woody Lombardi Durham (August 8, 1941 – March 7, 2018) was an American play- by-play radio announcer. He announced for the North Carolina Tar Heels football and men’s basketball programs from 1971 to 2011. He was born in Mebane, North Carolina. Durham died on March 7, 2018 from complications from primary progressive aphasia in Chapel Hill, North Carolina at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from primary progressive aphasia Category:American radio personalities Category:People from North Carolina
title: Woody Durham
